daily_daily_bounty_difficulty: Daily Bounty can only be collected on HARD difficulty
dialog_mp_restart_mission_no_card_host_m: Are you sure you want to restart the mission?
chat_message_daily_started: Host started a Daily Bounty. Finishing this Raid without failing a challenge card will give everyone $GOLD_BARS; gold bars!
chat_message_forced_challenge_card_appli: Forced Challenge Card '$CARD_NAME;' has been applied. Other suggestions will be ignored.
chat_message_card_failed: Forced Challenge Card has been failed, no gold will be awarded on mission end. Restart the mission if you wish to receive your reward.
chat_message_daily_finished: Congratulations! Everyone in the lobby was awarded $GOLD_BARS; gold bars (Ignore loot drop screen, it lies)
